title: "I'm disappointed in myself": Lewis Bloor admits he's a "fool" for not telling Marnie Simpson he cheated
text:
Lewis Bloor admits he was a "fool" for not telling Marnie Simpson he cheated Lewis poured his heart out on Twitter Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Marnie Simpson heartbroken over Lewis Bloor's cheating Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
Lewis Bloor has taken to Twitter to admit that he was a "fool" for not telling Marnie Simpson that he had cheated on her. 
The former TOWIE star poured his heart out on the social media site - admitting his wrongs. 
"I am utterly disappointed in myself for hurting such an amazing girl, she did not deserve any of the pain I have caused," he wrote. 
"It was a drunken mistake, a terrible thing I wish I had the courage to just admit my wrong doing so Marnie did not have to find out from these girls." 
He added: "I was with Marnie for the right reasons. A lot of the stuff that's been said is lies." 
Lewis acknoweldged that fans will think "badly" of him in the light of recent revelations. 
"Marnie is a great girl and I am clearly a fool for ruining what was something very special," he added. 
Earlier today, Marnie Simpson was dealt another blow after finding out that Lewis Bloor cheated on her. Marnie Simpson ranted on Snapchat (Photo: MarnieGshore/snapchat) 
And then the Geordie Shore star has been contacted by a girl on Instagram who claims to have done “everything but” have sex with Lewis during their romantic getaway to Barcelona in September last year. 
Marnie took to Snapchat this afternoon to share screenshots of the messages with fans. She accused Lewis of cheating (Photo: MarnieGshore/snapchat) 
“To make matters even worse I’ve just woken up to another message off a girl that told us Lewis cheated on us in Barcelona,” Marnie said. 
“Lewis waited until I was asleep in bed and then he got up and walked to the beach, he told us he was going to look at the view because he couldn't sleep. 
“But then he actually just took the girl back to a hotel room did everything apart sleep with her and then back to bed with me. 
Marnie was clearly incredulous that Lewis could do such a thing. Marnie said the girl contacted her (Photo: MarnieGshore/snapchat) 
“Can you believe that picture was taken the morning after? Can you actually believe that?” she said. 
The message from the unknown girl read: “I met him outside my hotel the W Barcelona, not really knowing who he was or that he had a girlfriend. 
“We spent the early hours of the morning together at the beach and back in my hotel, it was only when my friend got back that she recognised him and told me when he left and showed me his Instagram that I realised he had a girlfriend. 
“I’m so sorry, but you can do so much better than that fool.” Marnie and Lewis at the National Television Awards last month (Photo: WENN.com) 
Marnie then thanked the girl for her honesty and asked for more detail about what they actually did. 
“Everything but and the only reason we didn’t actually have sex is because I didn’t want to if you get me,” she replied.
